alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 3:59AM CDT until April 27 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Marion County in south central Mississippi... Northwestern Forrest County in southeastern Mississippi... Northern Lamar County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 358 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pine Burr, or 13 miles west of Purvis, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hattiesburg around 425 AM CDT. Oak Grove around 430 AM CDT. Sumrall around 440 AM CDT. Rawls Springs around 445 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
